item.title: Advance raves for Godzilla Minus One
AARP now sponsoring the Rolling Stones
item.description:
Ted Gioia (@tedgioia) on X

I’m not sure whether I’m depressed by the AARP sponsoring the Stones, or applaud it as the obvious move. But whether you love it or hate it, this is one more sign of the music culture’s obsession with what’s old and aging.

URL: https://twitter.com/tedgioia/status/1728167473965310031

item.title: Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie, RIP
item.description:
Alexander Lee (@alexander_c_lee) on X

Farewell to Emmanuel Le Roy Ladurie (1929-2023) - pioneering historian of the French peasantry and climate, leading figure of the Annales School, and one of the great masters of micro-history. A great loss to scholarship and public life.

URL: https://twitter.com/alexander_c_lee/status/1727642901495132288

item.description:
Stian Westlake (@stianwestlake) on X

***METASCIENCE KLAXON*** In June I promised more about what works when it comes to funding research and innovation. So I’m delighted that today @SciTechgovuk are announcing a new metascience unit, to be jointly run with @UKRI_News, with £10m of initial funding.

item.description:
Variety (@Variety) on X

Hall & Oates are in a confidential legal battle that has led to Daryl Hall getting a restraining order against John Oates. Hall filed an undisclosed complaint against Oates on Nov. 16. The court issued a temporary restraining order to begin Nov. 30. https://t.co/kvyvyHoZI6

item.title: Explaining Q learning, ho hum
item.description:
Barry Watkins (@dad_explains) on X

@BrianRoemmele Amazing deep dive Brian! I asked ChatGPT to break it down for me like a video game: Imagine you’re playing a video game where you have to make choices at each step. Q-learning is like having a super smart guidebook that tells you the best move to make at each point in the game.…

URL: https://twitter.com/dad_explains/status/1727566879038820550?s=46&t=og4Yz_HzFttaNpbOiBVKVA

source: Q* assorted links

item.title: Fern (@hi_tysam) on X
item.description:
Fern (@hi_tysam) on X

My beliefs on what Q* is doing (and why): - Train a population of agents to maximize interagent orthogonality and density coverage over a large text corpus. - Self-play with RL reward signal being any agent returning to original passage at any point. Reasoning in thread.

URL: https://twitter.com/hi_tysam/status/1727508108245881100

item.title: Navigating Attention-Driving Algorithms, Capturing the Premium of Proximity for Virtual Teams, & New AI Devices
item.description:
Edition #12 of Implications. This edition explores forecasts and implications around: (1) new laws emerging in the era of AI-powered algorithms that evolve our natural human tendencies, (2) the premium of proximity for teams and new methods and technologies that get teams aligned and culturally connected in a distributed world, and (3) some surprises at the end - including my take on a few topics of note…

URL: https://www.implications.com/p/navigating-attention-driving-algorithms?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: Links to Consider, 11/24
